tool_description: Be first to get the coupons that get posted online.
name: kuponiko
title: kuponiko

api_list.name: Recent coupons
api_list.description: Get coupons that got posted recently. You can specify the country that you want the coupons to be applicable to.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kuponiko.p.rapidapi.com/recent/US"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kuponiko.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kuponiko.p.rapidapi.com/recent/{country}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kuponiko.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Coupons from specific seller
api_list.description: Gives you the coupons from Amazon, Ebay and 40.000 other shops.

api_list.name: Seller by domain
api_list.description: Search the seller based on their website domain

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Returns the all matching sellers that relate to amazon.com
